document_data.name: Clavichord
document_data.mainbody: A '''clavichord''' was a large keyboard instrument.

Description.Sound: Clavichords expressed soft and silvery tones, with the pitch varying depending upon how much force was struck upon the keys. They couldn't reach particularly loud volumes, being quieter than harpsichords.

document_data.Notable Users:
Clavichords were often most appreciated by human communities<ref> and were a popular showpiece in merchant homes.
* The [[Bendekar's Mercantile]] storehouse in [[Ravens Bluff]] had a clavichord in their instruments collection.<ref>{{Cite polyhedron/98/A Handful of Dust|16}}
